tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE court_decisions (
  decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  judge_name VARCHAR(100),
  decision_date DATE,
  is_public BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Court_Decisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_date DATE,
    judge_name VARCHAR(255),
    decision TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Legal_Precedents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    precedent_name VARCHAR(255),
    precedent_date DATE,
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE court_decisions (
    decision_id INT,
    decision_date DATE,
    case_number VARCHAR,
    judge_name VARCHAR,
    decision_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE legal_precedents (
    precedent_id INT,
    precedent_date DATE,
    precedent_category VARCHAR,
    precedent_description TEXT,
    related_cases TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_users (
    user_id INT,
    user_name VARCHAR,
    user_role VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Court_Decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_title VARCHAR(255),
    judge_name VARCHAR(100),
    decision_date DATE,
    summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Legal_Precedents (
    precedent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    precedent_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_level VARCHAR(50),
    decision_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE Judges (
    judge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(100),
    years_on_bench INT,
    court_assigned VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Research_Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(100),
    organization VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)
